name: SSF9
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 9
subtitle: KRAS
notes: **Note**:  KRAS is a gene which belongs to a class of genes known as oncogenes. When mutated, oncogenes have the potential to cause normal cells to become cancerous. Studies suggest that KRAS gene mutations are often present in colorectal cancer.
